events.title: Mars News
events.description:
A new human outpost on Mars! 
 A new planet - new opportunities! 

 [weapons +2, supplies +5]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
We are fortifying our bases and setting up laboratories. 
 Several people went missing. 

 [weapons +3, supplies +6, people -2]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Scientists are expanding their contingent. 
 Time for new experiments! 

 [weapons +4, supplies +4]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
A minor accident during a teleporter test. 
 Casualties only among people. But on the other hand, we received new assets! 

 [weapons +5, supplies +3, people -4]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Space logistics is thriving! 
 More smart and brilliant scientists! 

 [weapons +6, supplies +2]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
An unprecedented incident! Theft and desertion! 
 Some of the supplies were recovered. The culprit has been punished. 

 [weapons +4, supplies +1, people -1]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
People say they saw strange creatures. 
 After a night patrol, one guard was missing. 

 [weapons +3, supplies +2, people -1]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
A Bug lair was discovered near the server complex. 
 A strike team was dispatched; losses are minimal. 

 [weapons +2, supplies +3, people -2]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
We are building fortifications! Thanks to Earth for the supplies! 
 Flying is becoming more dangerous, but the logistics team delivers cargo reliably. 

 [weapons +1, supplies +4, people -3]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
A group of Martians carried out a raid! 
 Minor losses; we'll manage! 

 [people -4]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Flying is becoming increasingly dangerous. 
 The number of regular flights has decreased. 

 [weapons +1, supplies +2]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
The Martian sky is restless.  
 Phobos and Deimos are watching you! 

 [weapons +1, supplies +2]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Pilots are starting to strike and refuse to perform their duty. 
 Supply lines have weakened. 

 [weapons +2, supplies +1]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Disruptions detected in the communication network. 
 Deliveries have decreased. 

 [weapons +2, supplies +1]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Today, the first spacecraft was shot down. 
 We are taking losses... It seems it has begun... 

 [people -2]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Hunger and gunfire â€” that's what the new day brought! 
 Increased demand for supplies and weapons. 

 [weapons -2, supplies -3, people -4]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
Fierce fighting at the colony walls. 
 Johnny! They're in flying saucers! 

 [weapons -3, supplies -2, people -6]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
A sudden illness has begun to affect people and the stock of space potatoes!!! 
 I wonder, is Martian soil edible? 

 [weapons -4, supplies -4, people -8]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
The colony is gripped by terror! 
 Urgent! Urgent!! URGENT!!! Send us everything!!! 

 [weapons -5, supplies -5, people -10]

events.title: Mars News
events.description:
SOS! 
 We urgently need Doomguy! 

 [people +1]
